BMB, RAQ, V_IN, V_OUT BMB, RAQ, V_IN, V_OUT are variables that are used to control the operation of the machine. BMB is used to control the operation of the water pump. RAQ is used to control the operation of the water heater resistor. V_IN is used to control the operation of the water inlet valve. V_OUT is used to control the operation of the water outlet valve. V_IN is used to control the operation of the water inlet valve.
V_OUT is used to control the operation of the water outlet valve.

If the water outlet valve is on and the machine is in auto mode or the water outlet valve is on in manual mode and the alarm is not on, turn on the water outlet valve
